id: Books/Book Reviews/The Man from the Future The Visionary Life of John von Neumann
title: The Man from the Future The Visionary Life of John von Neumann
description: This book is about the fascinating life of John von Neumann. It describes the work and the ramifications of the work he ventured on. Things like game theory, the biology of cell automata, economics, physics, mathematics, and computer science are all fields either founded or drastically influenced by the work of John von Neumann.
